程序包 frogger.controller

类 SelectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.controller.SelectController
  • public class SelectController
extends java.lang.Object

    SelectController

    The SelectController class is a controller for Select Screen

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Wenzheng Shan
    另请参阅:
    SceneSwitch

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SelectController

        public SelectController()

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

        This method is called when the scene is initialized.

        This method set gameLevel combox by reading the gameLevel constant from GameLevel. And call addTextLimiter(TextField, int) function to set the limit number of text.

      • backToStartScreen

        void backToStartScreen​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Called when the back is clicked and back to the start screen

        参数:
        event - The Button click event

      • goToGameScreen

        void goToGameScreen​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Called when the start is clicked and start the game

        This method will check the if the player enter their nickName and then pass the nickName (read from nickName) and gameLevel (read from gameLevel) to game screen.

        参数:
        event - The Button click event

      • checkNameEmpty

        public boolean checkNameEmpty()

        Check whether player input their nickName

        返回:
        true if nickName is empty, false otherwise

      • printNullNickNameError

        public void printNullNickNameError()
        print an alert to show the error information

      • addTextLimiter

        public static void addTextLimiter​(javafx.scene.control.TextField tf,
                                  int maxLength)

        This method is used to check whether the nickName has come to the max length.

        This method add an ChangeListener to nickName to detect the change of nickName. Each time the nickName is changed, the override function ChangeListener.changed(ObservableValue, Object, Object) will be called to detect the length of nickName and compared with maxLength.

        参数:
        tf - The TextField which will be added a ChangeListener
        maxLength - The max length of TextField
